data.name: Detective Winston Wayne
data.description:
Think with your hands and craft your way out of every challenge thrown at you by late Duke Hill.

Delve into an untold alternative history set between two world wars, where a war veteran turned seasoned detective finds himself thrust into an unprecedented case. The demise of a close friend is merely the tip of the iceberg, as a vast conspiracy looms on the horizon, challenging the resolve of our determined detective.

Some of the main features you'll find in Detective Winston Wayne: 
* New generation of escape room puzzles 
* Immerse yourself in Duke Hill's mesmerizing mansion 
* Realistic graphics on stand-alone Quest family devices
* An alternative history connecting World Wars
* Live through an ethical dilemma and navigate through several possible endings

Debut Game from Vancouver-based indie studio, SomniumPorta.
Stay Tuned and follow us on the store for more updates on Detective Winston Wayne.
